examples.example: 随着国际贸易的不断发展，各国之间的经济联系日益紧密。

translate.english: With the continuous development of international trade, the economic ties among countries are increasingly close.

examples.example: 中国积极开展对外贸易，与世界各国共享发展机遇。

translate.english: China actively conducts foreign trade and shares development opportunities with countries all over the world.

examples.example: 国际贸易的繁荣促进了世界各国的友好交流与合作。

translate.english: The prosperity of international trade promotes friendly exchanges and cooperation among countries all over the world.
